EmailTemplate.name: San Francisco - Fall 2011.2011 - Fall Reception Final Reminder - San Francisco
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register for MBO Partners' Fall Networking Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MBO Partners' Fall 2011 Networking Reception: Fairmont San Francisco - The Tonga Room, Dec. 7, 5:30 PM - 8:30 PM
Please join the MBO team, Associates, as well as representatives from many of our prestigious clients, for a night of networking and fun at the San Francisco Fairmont's Tonga Room. Today is the last day to register, so be sure to sign up if you are able to make it!
MBO invites you to this Networking Reception to learn about some of our exciting new initiatives, meet and mingle with fellow Associates, Clients, and MBO team managers, all while enjoying tasty cocktails, a live music band, and luscious hors d'oeuvres! Consider this a token of our appreciation for being part of our MBO family.
This is a party you do not want to miss, so hurry and register today, as space is limited - we all know how popular this reception is!
We look forward to seeing you! Register here: http://fallnetworkingreception2011.eventbrite.com
Sincerely,
MBO Partners
Suggested dress code is business to business casual Don't forget to bring your business cards Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006
*Just a few options for parking garages nearby, if you are unable to find street parking:
Masonic Auditorium 1111 California St. $8/hour, $30 max
Metro Parking Garage 1045 California St. $31 maximum
Grace Cathedral parking garage 1051 Taylor St. $27 maximum
Imperial parking SBC park stadium $35
Fairmont Hotel 950 Mason Street $52 Daily max. plus 14% city tax
Brocklebank Parking Garage 1040 Sacramento St. $38 compact vehicles $45 all other vehicles
